Package database

Class HibernateCRUD

java.lang.Object
database.HibernateCRUD
public class HibernateCRUD
extends java.lang.Object
Class to perform CRUD operations on the entities in the database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hadi Ibrahim

    • searchBasedOnCriteria

      public static java.util.List<Contact> searchBasedOnCriteria​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> attributeValuePair, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method searches for contacts and filters based on specified criteria
      Parameters:
      attributeValuePair - this is a map to build a predicate based on the attributes and corresponding pairs
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database
      Returns:
      List of contacts that matched the search criteria

    • batchInsertContacts

      public static void batchInsertContacts​(Contacts contacts, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method inserts a batch of contacts into the database
      Parameters:
      contacts - the contacts to insert into the database
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database

    • executeQuery

      public static java.util.List<?> executeQuery​(java.lang.String hql, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method executes a HQL query
      Parameters:
      hql - the HQL query as a string
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database
      Returns:
      List of results of the query

    • createEntity

      public static IDbEntity createEntity​(IDbEntity entity, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method creates a new record in the database
      Parameters:
      entity - the record to insert
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database
      Returns:
      returns the entity if it was added, null otherwise

    • readEntity

      public static IDbEntity readEntity​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.Class<? extends IDbEntity> type, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method reads an entity from the database by its id
      Parameters:
      id - this is the id of the entity in the database
      type - this is the Class type of the entity
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database
      Returns:
      an entity object, or null if not found

    • updateEntity

      public static void updateEntity​(long id, IDbEntity entity, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method updates the record that has the specified id with a new entity
      Parameters:
      id - this is the id of the entity to replace in the database
      entity - this is the updated record
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database

    • deleteEntity

      public static void deleteEntity​(IDbEntity entity, org.hibernate.Session session)
      this method deletes the record of the specified entity
      Parameters:
      entity - this is the record to delete
      session - this is the session that is connected to the database

      Parameters:
